About Mimi

Mimi So worked in her parents’ New York City atelier as a child, playing with diamonds and tools as if they were lego. She launched her own jewelry brand after graduating from Parsons, designing with an independent modern woman in mind. As a highly successful entrepreneur, she sits on the CFDA board of directors and mentors young talent.

Story

Coupling her impeccable eye for detail and timeless style, Mimi’s art-based jewelry is recognized around the world for its organic shapes, clean lines, and bold features. With a wide a celebrity clientele, Mimi’s jewelry has been worn by rock-stars and royalty alike, including Oprah, Beyoncé, and the cast of HBO’s iconic Sex and the City.

Design & Craftsmanship

In sync with the fashion calendar, Mimi releases two to three limited edition collections a year. Using the highest quality precious metals, diamonds, and gemstones, all of her pieces are handmade in her New York workshop. Like Mimi, the line is soulful and spiritual, yet with a voice that is rebellious and distinctive.
